TableSpec.Name: Website Child Search Partner Reservation Key
TableSpec.Description: Used to track the reservation keys for each child search catalog item
TableSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

EnumField.Name: KEYTYPECODE
EnumField.Description: What level of or type of sharing the reservation key prefix has

TextField.Name: RESERVATIONKEYPREFIX
TextField.Description: The string that is used for a particular set of reservation keys (all that start with a certain string)

TextField.Name: GENERALWEBSITEPROJECT
TextField.Description: Project Lookup ID for projects that are shared with the general website.
